text: Eternally Yours is a 1939 American comedy drama movie directed by Tay Garnett and starring Loretta Young, David Niven, Broderick Crawford, Billie Burke, Eve Arden, C. Aubrey Smith, Ralph Graves. It was distributed by United Artists and was nominated for an Academy Awards in 1940. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1939 comedy movies Category:1939 drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Tay Garnett
title: Eternally Yours (movie)
